  • Classes in nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.core.api used by nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.core.api
    Class
    Description
    GlowingBlockSpawner
    Represents a glowing block used for highlights
    GlowingBlockSpawner.Builder
    The default builder implementation for glowing blocks.
    IBigDoorsPlatform
    Represents a set of getter methods to get access to the internals of BigDoors.
    IBigDoorsToolUtil
    Represents a set of utility functions around the tool used by ToolUsers.
    IBlockAnalyzer
    Analyzes blocks to obtain various information.
    IBlockAnalyzer.MaterialStatus
    Represents the status of a material.
    IChunkLoader
    Tool that can be used to load chunks or check if they are already loaded.
    IChunkLoader.ChunkLoadMode
    Represents the different modes of checking chunks.
    IChunkLoader.ChunkLoadResult
    The result of attempting to load one or more chunks.
    IConfigLoader
    Represents a config with general options.
    IEconomyManager
     
    IMessageable
    Represents objects that can receive messages.
    IMessagingInterface
    Interface for messaging players and writing to console.
    IPermissionsManager
     
    IPExecutor
    Represents an interface that allows scheduling (a)sync tasks.
    IPLocation
    Represents a position in a world.
    IPPlayer
    Represents a BigDoors player.
    IProtectionCompatManager
    Class that manages all objects of IProtectionCompat.
    IPWorld
    Represents a BigDoors world.
    IRedstoneManager.RedstoneStatus
     
    PColor
    List of Minecraft colors.
